name: tableutils
title: A plugin for making HTML tables more lively and efficient and fixing the header with horizontal scrolling support.
description: A plugin for HTML Tables. You can - Fix Table Headers with both Vertical and Horizontal Scrolling support, Add master CheckBox, Enable Sorting, Filtering, Client-side and Server-side Numeric, Alphabetic and Alphanumeric Pagination, Addition of new rows to the table, Deletion of exiting rows, Editing of existing rows.
